title: Dark Drones & Horror Ambiences, Dark Cinematic Ambient SFX
description: 200 cutting edge dark ambient drone sound effects perfect for creating dark sci-fi soundscapes, dark atmospheres and creepy horror ambiences!
longDescription:
Youtube Demo: https://youtu.be/M_tUSFnn0Fs


Into Abyss sound library features 200 dark ambient drone sound effects (236 min total) perfect for creating disturbing, post-apocalyptic, dark atmosphere for your sci-fi or horror scenes.


If youâ€™re looking for otherworldly alien-like ambient sounds, eerie horror ambiences and creepy soundscapes or industrial sci-fi sounds of machine rooms, reactors, generators and engines that you can often hear in science fiction movies and games, this sound library will provide you plenty of material to choose from.


These dark ambient sound effects always work great as a background to enhance the anticipation and tension of sci-fi and horror scenes and help you with the immersion of your audience into a futuristic dystopian world!


All files are in Stereo WAV format. Sound effects are separated into three categories: 1. Evolving Drones 2. Pulsating Drones 3. Constant Drones


If you like the sound of Into Abyss then be sure to check out Annihilation, Ominous Drones, and Dystopian Drones sound libraries as well!


Into Abyss Sound Effects List
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 200

Number of Audio Cues: 200

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: Some sound effects are set to loop

Minutes of audio provided: 236 min
